At schools in foreign countries, it's hard to stay in the background.

(Soundbite of applause)
That's what happened when I visited this school in Vito, Peru, with my producer Marisa Penalosa.

We watched the class, recorded lots of sound, and prepared to leave as quietly as possible.
Fate had other plans.
We begged our driver, please, wait right there on the safe side of the muddy drainage ditch.
